open.title: MetroFibre degraded service | Eastern Cape
open.description: MetroFibre  has informed us of a network outage affecting Eastern Cape, affected clients will experience degraded service. MetroFibre engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.
